nodes.text: The Al'Moab system was a star system that consisted of four planets orbiting a dwarf star. Although populated, the Al'Moab system was largely ignored by the galactic community. Its main inhabited planet was Al'Moab III, a desert world that hosted mostly Humans.
The Al'Moab system has only been mentioned in L'Arche d'Alliance ("The Ark of Covenant"), a scenario published in the French RPG magazine Graal 17.
